entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
